  • Method Details

    • addProject

      public static Project addProject(String projectName, int erfNumber, String projectType, String projectAddress, double projectCost, double amountPaid, String dateFinalized)
      Creates a Project using the given project details.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project.
      erfNumber - the ERF number of the project.
      projectType - the building type of the project.
      projectAddress - the physical address of the project.
      projectCost - the cost of the project.
      amountPaid - the amount paid to date for the project.
      dateFinalized - the date the project was finalized, or "-" if not yet finalized.
      Returns:
      a new Project object.

    • addProject

      public static Project addProject(Project project)
      Adds a project to the project list.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to add.
      Returns:
      the added project.

    • addPerson

      public static Person addPerson(int phoneNumber, String firstName, String lastName, String physicalAddress, String emailAddress)
      Adds a new Person object to people using assignPerson(Person)
      Parameters:
      phoneNumber - of the person
      firstName - of the person
      lastName - of the person
      physicalAddress - of the person
      emailAddress - of the person
      Returns:
      the person

    • assignPerson

      public static Person assignPerson(Person person)
      Assigns a Person object to the result of Entity.getNumber() in people on that object.
      Parameters:
      person - the assigned person
      Returns:
      the person param

    • getPerson

      public static Person getPerson(int phoneNumber)
      Retrieves a Person object from people using the given phoneNumber.
      Parameters:
      phoneNumber - of the person to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the Person linked to phoneNumber.

    • getProjectByName

      public static Project getProjectByName(String projectName)
      Retrieves the Project assigned to projectName from projects.
      Parameters:
      projectName - name of the project to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the project object.

    • getProjectById

      public static Project getProjectById(int projectNumber)
      Retrieves the Project with index projectNumber from projects.
      Parameters:
      projectNumber - the index of the project in projects
      Returns:
      the retrieved Project, or null if projectNumber is out of range.

    • getProjects

      public static ArrayList<Project> getProjects()
      Returns:
      this EntityFactory's project list.

    • getPeople

      public static HashMap<Integer,Person> getPeople()
      Returns:
      this EntityFactory's people list.
